explanation: [0-0] A person wearing white gloves is wiping butter on a metal griddle. There are several metal containers on the right. The center of the griddle has changed color.

[0-10] First, the griddle is wiped with butter, then a slice of toast is placed on the hot griddle. The griddle has been greased, and you can see the oil sizzling. The cook flips the bread over. The bottom of the toast turns golden brown. Then they pick it up, look at it, grab the cut at the top and place it on the side of the griddle. They pick up the brush again and brush oil on the griddle.
